summary.para: Retrieves a thumbnail representation of an IHTMLDocument2 document.
Note This method is deprecated as of Windows 7. The feature it supported is no longer present in Windows.

param.name: pMaxSize
param.para: A pointer to a SIZE structure that specifies the maximum size of the bitmap, in pixels.

param.name: pHTMLDoc2
param.para: A pointer to an IHTMLDocument2 interface's interface.

param.name: phbmThumbnail
param.para: A handle to a bitmap that represents the document object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a method that obtains a thumbnail representation of an HTML wallpaper.
Note This interface is deprecated as of Windows 7. The feature it supported is no longer present in Windows.
